mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_type, member_status, profile_picture_url, token, created_at, updated_at FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_type, member_status, profile_picture_url, token, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_email}, #{member_phone}, #{member_type}, #{member_status}, #{profile_picture_url}, #{token}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_name = #{member_name}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, profile_picture_url = #{profile_picture_url}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
UPDATE member SET member_status = 'INACTIVE', updated_at = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
